Headline: Harlem-bound Green & 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains bypassing Morgan/Lake Station
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green & 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morgan/Lake due to a defective station entrance door.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green & 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morgan/Lake due to a defective station entrance door.

  • For Harlem-bound Green or 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line train service to these stations, take a Harlem-bound Green or 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line train to Ashland/Lake and transfer to 63rd-bound Green or Loop-bound Pink Line train.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
